Project_Description: Endometrial-derived Mesenchymal Stem Cells are one of the most promising candidates for stem cell-based therapies. Here we hypothesize that extracellular vesicles released by these cells may have a promising therapeutic effect, especially, those vesicles derived from IFNγ primed cells. Based on this hypothesis, here we have characterized the proteomic and the miRNAs profile of these vesicles.
